entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
